ranks.text: After 6/25, visit Kanda Church and talk to the girl towards the front. To start the cooperation you'll need at least rank 3 (suave) charm, otherwise she'll just ignore you. Unlocks Koma Sabaki, which lets you swap out party members on the fly mid-battle whenever it's Joker's turn.
Impactful Conversation Choices for this Rank:Bonus: Knowledge Up
Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks Uchikomi, giving your non-present allies a chance to drop in for an extra attack after an enemy is downed. Bonus: Knowledge Up
Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Bonus: Knowledge UpUnlocks the Book Town location.
Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks Kakoi Kuzushi, which allows you to attempt to escape from battle even when enemies have you surrounded. Bonus: Knowledge Up
Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Bonus: Knowledge UpUnlocks the Sky Tower Location.
Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks Narikin, a chance to get double money if you win the battle in one full party turn after an ambush. Bonus: Knowledge Up

options.dialogue: "It may all come down to luck."

ranks.text: Requires rank 5 (erudite) knowledge. Impactful conversation choices for this rank:After this a sidequest / request for Mementos is unlocked: Upstaging the Stage Mother. Iomplete the Upstaging the Stage Mother sidequest, then return to Hifumi:Bonus: Knowledge Up

This is the point when a romance with Hifumi Togo becomes available. Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Romance - "I want to stay by your side."Friendship - "I want to become stronger."Romance - "I want us to date."Friendship - "We'll be friends forever."Unlocks Touryou, removing the need to wait before you can escape from battle.

choices.romance: "I want to stay by your side."

ranks.text: Any choices you make will be irrelevant, since this is the max rank. Unlocks Togo System, allowing you to switch in and out party members during any party member's turn.
